CustomField.formula: LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'0','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'1','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'2','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'3','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'4','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'5','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'6','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'7','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'8','')) == 2 || LEN(Name) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Name,'9','')) == 2
CustomField.label: Valid_for_part2
